column2: Raising the minimum wage may have negative consequences on small businesses and cause some to go out of business.
column3: The adoption of robotics and automation in industries may be accelerated as a result of raising the minimum wage.
column4: Addressing income inequality is crucial and increasing the minimum wage is a step towards addressing this problem.
column5: A basic minimum income could be a possible alternative to increasing the minimum wage.
column6: Some people believe the minimum wage should be even higher, such as $20 or $25 per hour.
